channel.description: Recent content in Research on Ingrid Arreola | Portfolio

item.title: Iron Quest
item.description: Iron Quest “A monthly community-led data visualization project…participants have a calendar month to source a suitable data set and then design, build, and submit a data visualization. Every viz should aim to showcase best practice & skill in design, storytelling & analysis.
